Agreed, it is=
 the best camera to get. =C2=A0There are several models available: some hav=
e built in IR lights, some have IR / UV lights, some are set-up for sky wat=
ching, and others are just plain ol' full spectrum. 


With this camera (de=
pending on the model, a regular one with the different options run around $=
120-150), you will also need the power supply ($12-$20), a tripod, and a po=
rtable recorder. =C2=A0My group uses 2 of them and each one is attached to =
a portable DVD recorder that has a small LCD screen, you can find these ref=
urbished for under $100.


Tim
